Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 94th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Kyle Pantoja (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off William Lisk (BRO)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2015, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Kansas City on 7/6/2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/2/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis (B) on 9/15/2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/4/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/27/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
8/4/2018: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $14,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2019, hitting .364 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 9/12/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2019, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Philadelphia on 3/2/2020 (Going to HOU: CF Hugh Lalonde, C James Howell, C Juan Forest. Going to PHI: 3B Tyler Gauna)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2020, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2021, hitting .313 with 7 HR, 22 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/5/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/10/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $3,400,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2024, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
